content.text:
> While I don't speak JS, I'm sure there must be scoping so that it isn't a problem, but doesn't that kind of naming make things more difficult to debug?

Yeah, shadowed variables are no good -- I'm hoping to start making some linting changes once the open PRs are merged.

I think you could have this issue if `unbox` is a function, but it *should* be [an object](https://github.com/ssbc/secure-scuttlebutt/blob/942e5297fa9e842a0e2668cac2657aedc55ee6d9/minimal.js#L80-L83), so I'm unclear on what's going on. I have a PR open, but I'm unclear whether it's The Right Way to resolve your problem. I'm just confused at why it's only happening to you.
